column1: Uchi////I would've given Uchi Houston 5 stars
column2: if it weren't for their gatekeeper hostesses who gave me bad attitudes the four times that I've been there so far.  Really
column3: why does their need to be 4 different girls working the entrance in that tiny space?? If they could be a little more polite
column4: and not so rude when I call or walk through the door
column5: Uchi would be perfect.  Their hostesses should represent this great establishment better.  Those girls are nothing but glorified door greeters
